title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

The American Federation of Teachers is doubling down on the battle to teach Critical Race Theory in schools. Second largest defense contractor in the US is making employees sit through diversity training. Callers weigh in, many anonymously, on the CRT and diversity training forced on them by woke employers. Christopher Rufo exposes Raytheon's Critical Race Theory program that encourages white employees to confront their "privilege," reject the principle of "equality," and "defund the police." What are the options for employees?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
